"Hmm, a word, if you would.": "Fighting isn't the be all and end all of our roles as ARKS."
"Communicating with others and mastering our use of our Mags are just as important."
"There's someone I'd like to introduce you to."
"It's possible that you already know her. I want you to visit a woman named Rediah."
"Rediah holds the rank of Senior Training Instructor. She has many useful things to teach you."
"Rediah should be waiting near the shops. Please listen to what she has to say."
